Action description: Wipe the face with a paper or cloth.
Move a broom back and forth on the ground.
Put down the bag on the back or hand.
Move a mop back and forth on the ground.
Throw the hat on the hand high into the air.
Put a cookie into the mouth.
Raise one hand, make a fist, flip it over so the palm is down, and extend the thumb downwards.
Pick up the phone and swipe on it.
Raise either the left or right hand, make a fist, and lift the index and middle fingers.
Pick up the tablet and swipe on it.
Put on the headphones that are on the hand or on the table.
Take off the headphones from the ears.
Put on the hat that is in hand or on the table.
Bend the upper body forward and down.
Take off the hat from the head.
Shake the head from left to right.
Put on the gloves that are on the hand or on the table.
Raise the left or right hand, make a circle with the thumb and index finger, and extend the other three fingers.
Roll up the sleeves that are let down.
Slowly bend both legs until the angle between the thigh and the lower leg is less than ninety degrees.
Let down the rolled-up sleeves.
Raise one hand with the index finger upright, pointing to the target object.
Cross both arms.
Slip one or both hands into the pockets of a jacket or trousers.
Place both hands palm-to-palm and then bring them together.
Place one hand by the mouth with the index finger upright.
Lift one or both hands and play with the hair.
Raise one hand and use the thumb to flick the index and middle fingers.
Cross both arms in an X shape.
Raise both hands with palms facing outward.
Open your mouth wide, lean your whole body forward, and make a "ah-choo" sound.
Place both palms facing inward and then clap them together.
Take off the headset from the head.
Organize the playing cards that are on the table in a mess.
Position the phone camera towards oneself and pose.
Plug the earphone into the phone, then put the earphone to the ear.
Flip a coin into the air.
Use a stapler to staple papers.
Take the earphone from the ear, then unplug it from the phone.
Shuffle the playing cards or any card deck.
Shake the head up and down.
Fold clothes on a flat surface.
Trim nails with scissors.
Wipe shoes with a cloth.
Hold the head with both hands, showing a painful expression.
Hold the chest with both hands, showing a painful expression.
Put on the headset normally on the head.
Hold the waist with both hands, showing a painful expression.
Throw the garbage in hand into the trash can.
Hold the neck with both hands, showing a painful expression.
Hold the stomach with both hands, showing a painful expression.
Throw the ball in hand into the basket.
Jump with a skipping rope on the spot, can be with both feet or alternating each foot.
Wipe the windows with a cloth.
Open your mouth wide and cover it with both hands.
Rub the legs with both hands.
With your mouth slightly open, make a "cough cough cough" sound.
Take off the gloves from the hands.
Stretch both hands upward, squint your eyes slightly, open your mouth wide, and slowly straighten your waist.
Stretch out one arm and rotate it to an angle.
Continuously pat the clothes several times from top to bottom.
Pretend to vomit by taking a sip of water and then spitting it out, can use a bag for effect.
Slowly squat down, sit on the ground with any leg position (cross-legged or sitting straight is fine).
Touch the nose with the hand.
Rub the back with the hand.
Move a large object.
Brush teeth back and forth with a toothbrush.
Lift one or both hands and wave, with a smile.
Hold the phone to the ear with one hand.
Take a piece of restaurant paper from the box.
Do push-ups with both hands on the ground.
Take a picture of someone with a mobile phone or camera.
Cut paper with scissors.
Whisper into another person's ear.
Take something out of the pocket.
Drink water from a cup or an open container in hand.
Put on the coat that is on the hand or hanging somewhere.
Hit someone with something in your hand.

Action: crumple the paper into a ball
Action description: Crumple a piece of paper into a ball.
Raise the wristwatch and look straight at the watch face.
Put on the glasses from the hand or glasses case.
Take off the glasses from the nose.
Put on the glasses from the hand or glasses case.
Step forward with one foot, squat down, and tie the shoelaces that have come loose on the front foot.

Action: two people hold hands and turn in circles
Action description: Hold hands and rotate around a point where the hands are joined, in one direction.
Turn off the tap of the water dispenser or sink.
Turn on the tap of the water dispenser or sink.
Rub your hands against each other.
Take a tissue, place it on the nose with both hands, and pinch the nose.
Randomly shake a chair (any direction is okay).
Sit down in a chair while standing.
Take a cup or other container, tilt it, and pour the water inside into the sink.
Stand up straight with one hand in a salute.
Raise one hand, make a fist, and extend the thumb upwards.
Spin a pen on the fingertips.

Sniff something in front of the nose.

Stand up from the chair.

Throw the thing in hand to the ground.

Raise one or both hands, make a fist, and extend it outward from the inside.

Tear a piece of paper.
Ride a bicycle outdoors.
Rotate your body while standing.
Throw the ball with your hand to a distance.
Walk down the stairs.
Move both hands up and down on the face.

Start by sitting or standing, then slowly stretch out and lie down on the bed.

Use a cup to catch water.
Kick the ball away with your foot.

Action: two people walking hand in hand
Action description: Walk hand in hand.
Grasp one hand with the other, place elbows on a table or the ground, and try to press the other person's wrist down onto the table or ground.

Make gestures to each other.

Walk behind another person.
Stand facing each other and bow to one another.
Plug into the power strip.
Place one leg over the other, left or right foot is fine.

Swing both hands to one side, tilt the body back and forth with the hands, exert force, and jump forward.

Action description: Run hand in hand.
Perform a short sequence of Tai Chi movements.
Open a closed laptop.
Close an open laptop.
Embrace each other.
Place both hands on the keyboard and press the keys.
Walk away from each other, back to back.
Move the mouse with one hand.

Action: give a pat on the back
Action description: One person pats another person on the back.
Exchange items with each other.
Walk forward with your chest out and eyes looking straight ahead.
